title: The Sexiest Man Alive
description: Valentine Male... When Matt Romano proposed closing down Chic magazine, Susannah was determined to stop him in his tracks. He was a boardroom barracuda! She came up with a brilliant plan to boost Chic's circulation: find the sexiest man alive and feature him as the Valentine's Day centerfold. But Matt insisted on supervising her search. Suddenly Susannah was surrounded by half a dozen gorgeous guys, all vying to get between the sheets--of her magazine, of course. But she longed to be seduced by Matt, who got her vote as the world's sexiest man!
author: Sandra Marton
